birds

Interface ConservatoryInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConservatoryClass

    public interface ConservatoryInterface
    This interface represents and encapsulates the Conservatory. This Conservatory is the house for rescued birds and they consists of aviaries. Each aviary will contain some birds. This interface is implemented by the abstract ConservatoryClass.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAviariesToConservatory(Aviaries aviary)
      Takes an aviary object as input and adds it to the conservatory.
      void addBirdsToConservatory(Birds bird)
      Takes a bird object as input and adds it to the conservatory.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> calculateFood()
      Responsible for calculating the food required in the conservatory.
      void checkCompatibility(Aviaries aviary, Birds bird)
      Takes Aviaries object and Birds object, it decides how and where to add the birds to the conservatory.
      java.util.ArrayList<Aviaries> getAviaryList()
      Defines an empty Aviaries list.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSingleClass()
      Takes nothing, just returns.
      void setSingleClass(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> singleClass)
      Defines an list of bird types that wouldn't mix with any other type.

    • Method Detail

      • getAviaryList

        java.util.ArrayList<Aviaries> getAviaryList()
        Defines an empty Aviaries list.
        Returns:
        the list of aviaries present in the conservatory

      • getSingleClass

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSingleClass()
        Takes nothing, just returns.
        Returns:
        the list of bird types that wouldn't mix with any other type

        Defines an list of bird types that wouldn't mix with any other type.

      • addAviariesToConservatory

        void addAviariesToConservatory(Aviaries aviary)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes an aviary object as input and adds it to the conservatory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addBirdsToConservatory

        void addBirdsToConservatory(Birds bird)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes a bird object as input and adds it to the conservatory. It checks for compatibility and calls the addAviariesToConservatory method whenever necessary.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkCompatibility

        void checkCompatibility(Aviaries aviary,
                        Birds bird)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes Aviaries object and Birds object, it decides how and where to add the birds to the conservatory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • calculateFood

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> calculateFood()
        Responsible for calculating the food required in the conservatory.
        Returns:
        the hashmap of birdType as key and quantity of food as value
